author: The Xilaman
message: who is up today? shame this attorney is nervous. relax you're doing well 😊❤ advocate* The whole nation is watching. yes you're right. she'll find her stride. hearing these people state their qualifications motivates me to work harder. impressive. how did the state capture project happen with such capable people at the helm? how do we get SOE CEOs without matric qualification when SA has hoards of qualified people. 🤣 I love South Africa when we aren't going head to head. commissions like this etc show us that there are many outstanding individuals in our country.
